title: Exquisite Diamond and Emerald Floral Cascade Necklace
materials: adorned with dazzling brilliant-cut diamonds and vibrant oval-cut emeralds. Features meticulously selected diamonds with exceptional clarity and fire. Gross Weight: 105.220(Fg)
features: This breathtaking necklace showcases a modern floral cascade design, featuring delicate diamond-encrusted floral motifs interspersed with captivating oval-cut emeralds. Each element is carefully set to maximize sparkle and create a stunning visual impact. The flexible links ensure comfortable wear while maintaining the necklace's exquisite form. The overall design blends contemporary aesthetics with timeless elegance, resembling a contemporary 'Addigai' in its close-fitting style.
colors: creating a striking contrast and a refreshing
sophisticated look. The white gold complements the brilliance of the diamonds and enhances the emerald's rich color.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (vivaaham)
and high-profile social events. Its contemporary design makes it equally suitable for formal galas and upscale gatherings
adding a touch of regal elegance to any ensemble.
description: This necklace is a statement piece that exudes luxury and sophistication. The combination of high-quality diamonds and vibrant emeralds creates a truly captivating effect. Its unique design blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with a contemporary flair, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. This is a timeless treasure you'll cherish for generations.
